title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Sudan 2024
yAxis: Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
In general Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars, about 66.45 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars about 2.25 was reached at Year 1990

max_summary: The chart generally has many fluctuations.
The chart generally has many fluctuations.
This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 41 data points.
In general Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars, about 66.45 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars about 2.25 was reached at Year 1990
The line rapidly increased by 76.44% from Year 1988 to 1989, and lastly, decreased by 86.65% from Year 1989 to 1990.
